name: Building Resources
description: Salvaged and reusable building materials including construction supplies, fixtures, and landscaping materials available at reduced cost; some materials available for nonprofit projects
fullDescription: Building Resources is a nonprofit reuse center in San Francisco that sells salvaged and donated building materials at affordable prices, with special programs for nonprofits.
whatTheyOffer:
- Salvaged lumber and wood products
- Doors, windows, and hardware
- Plumbing and electrical fixtures
- Kitchen and bathroom cabinets
- Landscaping materials
- Paint and finishing supplies
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Building Resources warehouse
2. Browse available materials
3. Pay reduced prices (typically 50-90% off retail)
4. Nonprofits may qualify for additional discounts or donations
5. Transport materials yourself or arrange delivery
